ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions for warriors to add to list
ygData.msgSnippet: Some have already been brought up...
ygData.messageBody:
Some have already been brought up...

> 1) Specialization for weapons like magic users get. Can only specialize in
> one weapon over the skill of 50 - increased speed, more damage, more
> attack with that weapon, etc.
>
> 2) Critical Strike - operates much like backstab does for rogue. It has a
> recycle time, must use it to raise in level. Does triple damage when
> successful.
>
> 3) Sleep - This would be the equivalent to magic users meditate spell. You
> heal at a faster rate, but your entire screen is blacked out (ala blindess
> spell).
>
> 4) Triple attack. At level 30 you get a chance for a third hit.
>
> Any of these would be a warrior only skill, and I doubt if it would change
> the balance of the game any, only making the warriors more than just a
> damage-taker.
>
> Angarth, Sponge of the 15th Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>
